item.title: Tinkering with VS Code, Mac and C++
item.description: After a long time, I got some time to tinker with something fun and learn from it, thanks to the week-long break from work. The task at hand is to set up Visual Studio for Mac to compile/run/debug C++ programs. Why, you may wonder - because I wanted to read and learn from the book Data Structures and Algorithms in C++ by Adam Drozdek. For the past few months, I was having a craving to learn something new and became curious when I saw this book on my shelf.
